refnamediv.refpurpose: How to manage Scilab's String read and write process using call_scilab and api_scilab

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This help describes how strings and matrix of strings can be handle through the Call Scilab API and api Scilab.
There are several functions which can be used to read / write from the memory of Scilab. These functions are described in dedicated pages.

para.note: Note: Access to variables is done through api Scilab (named variable).
